metadata.name: Mona Lisa Artist Proof #1
metadata.description: The Mona Lisa c.1503-6 (oil on panel) is a half-length portrait painting created by the Italian Renaissance master Leonardo da Vinci. A true masterpiece of Renaissance art, renowned for its technical mastery, enigmatic smile, and timeless beauty. It continues to captivate audiences and remains one of the most famous and beloved paintings in the world. This is the first ever officially licensed Mona Lisa NFT as a premium digital artwork in 3D by ElmonX. Holders can view and interact with the NFT in Augmented Reality. Ownership of the Artist Proof edition unlocks a matching physical museum quality pictorial depth print. The print measures 77 x 53 cm, the same size as the Mona Lisa. Artist Proof editions physical and digital are individually numbered on the back of the Mona Lisa. Edition: 1 of 10
